#summary The applet border attribute specifies the visible border around the element.

== Elements ==

You can use the `border` attribute on the following elements:

  * [AppletElement <applet>]
  * [FrameElement <frame>]
  * [FramesetElement <frameset>]
  * [IframeElement <iframe>]
  * [ImgElement <img>]
  * [ObjectElement <object>]
  * [TableElement <table>]
